summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Queen Anne driveway and 5th Avenue North from Hayes Street to Lynn Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 12972, creating Local Improvement District No. 1174 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
